===================
Domains and options
===================

``checklet``
============

The ``checklet`` domain contains the options defined by the checklets and is used to configure checklet
specific parameters.

``scheduler``
=============

.. toctree::

   scheduler/index
   scheduler/preflight-option
   scheduler/tasks-option

``tools``
=========

.. toctree::

   tools

``x-...``
=========

Domain names starting with ``x-`` can be used for private use cases.

Other domain names
==================

All other domain names are reserved for use by Momotor in the future.
